suncertify.server
Class LockManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.server.LockManager
public class LockManager
extends java.lang.Object

LockManager is a helper class takes care of thread safety and locking during the concurrent access to the database by using several clients

Version:
1.2 05 Apr 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos

          flag that indicates the lock of the entire database
private  java.util.Map locks
          holds the records blocked for all remote connection

 void lock(int recNum, java.lang.Object client)
          This method block until the requested lock can be applied If the method is called with an argument of -1, the entire database should be locked.

Method Detail

lock

public void lock(int recNum,
                 java.lang.Object client)
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
This method block until the requested lock can be applied If the method is called with an argument of -1, the entire database should be locked.

Parameters:
recNum - A int indicates the record to be locked
client - A Object representing the remote connection of client-side
Throws:
InterruptedException - Signals that the thread has been interrupted
java.lang.InterruptedException

unlock

public void unlock(int recNum,
                   java.lang.Object client)
Removes the lock from the specified record

Parameters:
recNum - A int representing the record being unlocked
client - A Object representing the remote connection of client-side
